text: Enrique Collar Monterrubio (born 2 November 1934) is a Spanish former professional footballer. He played as a left winger. He made 16 appearances and scored 4 goals for the Spain national football team from 1955 to 1963. He played in the 1962 FIFA World Cup. ==Other websites== * * National team data * * CÃ¡diz CF profile * Valencia CF profile * Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish footballers
title: Enrique Collar
